about_the_game:
Outsmart your opponent as your favorite fighter in this turn-based card battler! Your moves may leave you vulnerable, making it easy for your opponent to exploit.

Engage in Stage Fighting, a popular activity enjoyed by many from various backgrounds across this fictional Empire. For their own reasons, each of the fighters found themselves in this major city under the Empire's ruling. They come from a variety of professions and experiences - peacekeepers, actors, builders, and many more. Each fighter has their unique deck as their move set, and many of them have special mechanics for you to utilize.

Adapt to your opponent's techniques. Play to the strength of your chosen fighter. Gain an advantage and achieve victory by playing the right move at the right time.

LITE version features

  • New player guidance with Assistant

  • Play with/against 4 distinct fighters

  • Add some house rules

  • Play against Assistant

  • Play against other LITE version players

  • Complete quests and obtain new content exchange tickets. Not super useful in LITE but they can be carried over to the FULL version.

  • In sync with all quality of life improvements in FULL version

FULL version features (on top of LITE version)

  • Play with/against 8 extra fighters that can be unlocked over time

  • 3 Expansion packs that change up the mechanics or add new ones

  • Earn in-game currency while playing the game and spend them on new stuff

  • Play against other FULL version players

  • Customize your stage with items you've obtained

  • Steam Deck support
detailed_description:
Outsmart your opponent as your favorite fighter in this turn-based card battler! Your moves may leave you vulnerable, making it easy for your opponent to exploit.

Engage in Stage Fighting, a popular activity enjoyed by many from various backgrounds across this fictional Empire. For their own reasons, each of the fighters found themselves in this major city under the Empire's ruling. They come from a variety of professions and experiences - peacekeepers, actors, builders, and many more. Each fighter has their unique deck as their move set, and many of them have special mechanics for you to utilize.

Adapt to your opponent's techniques. Play to the strength of your chosen fighter. Gain an advantage and achieve victory by playing the right move at the right time.

  • New player guidance with Assistant

  • Play with/against 4 distinct fighters

  • Add some house rules

  • Play against other LITE version players

  • Complete quests and obtain new content exchange tickets. Not super useful in LITE but they can be carried over to the FULL version.

  • In sync with all quality of life improvements in FULL version

FULL version features (on top of LITE version)

  • Steam Deck support
name: Stage Fighter Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7470, 1 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Outsmart your opponent as your favorite fighter in this turn-based card battler! Your moves may leave you vulnerable, making it easy for your opponent to exploit. Explore a range of playable fighters, each of whom has a unique move set, and many come with their own unique mechanics.
